nodes.text: A power capacitor was a piece of equipment that certain systems, such as turbolasers, needed to function. In 8 ABY, Captain Keleman Ciro of the New Republic needed fifty turbolaser power capacitors for the CEC CR90 corvette FarStar. Although he and his crew looked around the planet Kal'Shebbol, they were unable to find them. When prospective crewbeing Loh'khar appeared with his Turazza minions and fifty new capacitors, Ciro accepted them in the crew.
